'''May Your Dreams of Wisdom Come True''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Duration==
October 28, 2022 12:00 – November 2, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)

==Eligibility==
[[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above

==Event Details==
# During the event, Travelers will need to complete the designated event missions as well as help Nahida fulfill the wishes of the people of Sumeru. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.<br>{{Card|Primogem|40|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Nagadus Emerald Fragment|3|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|20,000|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|2|show_caption=1}}
# After completing the event, share the event to get the event wallpaper.<gallery>
May Your Dreams of Wisdom Come True Wallpaper.png
</gallery>

==Soundtracks==
{{Soundtracks by Category Table|type=eventgameplay}}

==Notes==
# Please log in to the event using your HoYoverse Account and select your corresponding character in Genshin Impact to take part. This will ensure that your rewards can be sent and claimed correctly.
# The event wallpaper is not available after the event ends. Please claim it in time.
# The in-game rewards will be distributed via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
